name: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich and full of flavor, our hot chocolate combines dark chocolate and steamed milk for a warm, sweet treat

name: Dahi Vada
description: A melange of spices, chutney, crunchy vada, yoghurt and freshly chopped coriander. Discover the artistry of flavors, where every bite is a celebration of gastronomic perfection.

name: Choco Chip Cookies
description: A melange of spices, chutney, crunchy vada, yoghurt and freshly chopped coriander. Discover the artistry of flavors, where every bite is a celebration of gastronomic perfection

name: Caffe macchiato
description: The macchiato is an espresso coffee drink, topped with a small amount of foamed or steamed milk to allow the taste of the espresso to still shine through.

name: Veg Spring Rolls
description: A traditional Chinese savory snack where a pastry sheet is filled with vegetables, rolled & fried. Discover the artistry of flavors, where every bite is a celebration of gastronomic perfection.

name: Rum Ball Cookies
description: A traditional Chinese savory snack where a pastry sheet is filled with vegetables, rolled & fried. Discover the artistry of flavors, where every bite is a celebration of gastronomic perfection.
